translation.it: Anche voi vorrete una pausa dai litigi.

translation.en: I mean, whose song gets on the album,
whose song's the single, who wrote what...
translation.it: quali fare uscire come singoli, chi ha scritto cosa,

translation.en: who gets a bigger slice of the royalties, what's on the B-side, all of it.
translation.it: chi prende più diritti d'autore, la scelta del Lato B. Non volete staccare?

translation.en: -You must need a break. -Freddie, we're a family.
translation.it: la scelta del Lato B. Non volete staccare? Siamo una famiglia.

translation.en: No, we're not! We're not a family!
translation.it: No, non è vero! Non lo siamo!

translation.en: You've got families, children, wives.
translation.it: Voi avete una famiglia, moglie, figli.

translation.en: What have I got?
You've got $4 million. Perhaps you can buy yourself a family.
translation.it: Quattro milioni. Forse puoi comprartene una.

translation.en: [Freddie] I won't compromise my vision any longer.
translation.it: Non voglio più accettare compromessi artistici.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Roger] Compromise?
Are you joking?
You were working at Heathrow before we gave you a chance.
translation.it: Prima di incontrare noi, lavoravi a Heathrow.

translation.en: And without me... you-- you'd be a dentist...
translation.it: Senza di me, tu faresti il dentista

translation.en: drumming 12/8-time blues at the weekend at the Crown and Anchor.
translation.it: e nei weekend suoneresti blues in 12/8 al pub del quartiere.

translation.en: And you. Well, you would be Dr. Brian May...
translation.it: E tu... Be', tu saresti il prof. Brian May,

translation.en: author of a fascinating dissertation on the cosmos that no one ever reads.
translation.it: autore di un'interessante dissertazione sul cosmo che nessuno leggerà mai.

translation.en: And Deacy...
for the life of me... nothing comes to mind.
translation.it: per quanto mi sforzi, non mi viene in mente niente.

translation.en: I studied electrical engineering.
-Does that meet your standard? -It's perfect.
You just killed Queen.
Oh, give it a kiss one day. She might wake up.
translation.it: Mai dire mai. Basta un bacio per svegliare la Regina.

translation.en: You need us, Freddie.
-More than you know. -I don't need anyone.
translation.it: Più di quanto tu creda. Non ho bisogno di nessuno.

translation.en: -[drink pouring] -[phone ringing]
-[Freddie playing piano] -[Paul] Hello?
-Paul. Can I speak to Freddie? -Oh, Mary. No, he can't talk right now.
translation.it: Paul. Posso parlare con Freddie? Mary. No, ora non può venire al telefono.

translation.en: He's working day and night, constantly.
translation.it: Lavora giorno e notte, senza sosta.

translation.en: Will you make sure to tell him that I called?
Don't worry, he's in safe hands.
I will certainly tell him you called.
translation.it: Gli riferirò che lo hai cercato.

translation.en: -Freddie, it's really great. -[music stops]
It's shit!
Just leave it. [Paul] Yeah, hang on one second.
-[Freddie singing on recording] -Give it more treble.
[Beach] Where is he? Is he there? I wanna speak to him.
translation.it: Dov'è? È lì? Voglio parlare con lui.

translation.en: He is working himself to the bone.
I'm blue in the face trying to get him to take a break.
translation.it: Gli ripeto fino alla nausea di riposarsi.

translation.en: [Beach] Paul, listen to me. It's one performance for a good cause.
translation.it: Paul, ascolta. Una sola volta, per una buona causa.

translation.en: It's a televised concert for the famine in Ethiopia.
translation.it: Un concerto in TV per la fame in Etiopia.

translation.en: They're gonna have simultaneous performances in Philadelphia and London.
translation.it: Show in contemporanea a Filadelfia e a Londra.

translation.en: There's gonna be a billion people watching. Queen should be part of it.
translation.it: Un miliardo di telespettatori. I Queen devono partecipare.

translation.en: [Paul] He's just been really focused, but I'll be sure to pass it on.
translation.it: È molto concentrato. Gli riferirò il messaggio.

translation.en: Sure you will.
Hi.
[Freddie] Hi. Come in, come in.
Why did you come all this way?
I just haven't heard from you in so long, and I phoned and phoned, and then...
translation.it: Non ti sentivo da una vita, ho telefonato tante volte.

translation.en: last night I just had this terrible dream that something bad had happened...
translation.it: Ieri notte ho sognato che ti era successo qualcosa.

translation.en: [Freddie] No, no. I've been working, that's all.
Freddie, you're burning the candle at both ends.
translation.it: Freddie, stai tirando troppo la corda.

translation.en: Yes, but the glow is so divine.
translation.it: Sì, ma la ribalta è divina.

translation.en: Being human is a condition that requires a little anesthesia.
translation.it: Un essere umano, per vivere, ha bisogno di un po' di anestesia.

translation.en: -I miss you. -I miss you. I miss you so much.
translation.it: - Mi manchi. - Anche tu. Mi manchi tanto.

translation.en: Listen, but I have to finish the second album.
translation.it: Ma devo finire il secondo album.

translation.en: I need you.
Stay. Stay here with me. Just you and me.
translation.it: Resta. Resta qui con me. Noi due soli.

translation.en: I need the love of my life.
translation.it: Ho bisogno dell'amore della mia vita.

translation.en: Freddie... What about Queen?
Jim told me he's been trying to contact you about Live Aid,
translation.it: Jim ti sta cercando per il Live Aid,

translation.en: and you won't take his calls.
What is Live Aid?
You haven't heard?
Freddie, it's the biggest concert there's ever been or ever will be.
translation.it: È il più grande concerto mai organizzato.

translation.en: It's for the famine in Africa.
translation.it: È per la fame in Africa.

translation.en: Well, perhaps Paul thought it wasn't a good idea.
translation.it: È per la fame in Africa. Forse Paul ha scartato l'idea.

translation.en: A distraction from my work.
That's what's important, that I finish this album.
-Stay with me, darling, and I'll be all right. -Freddie, I can't stay with you.
translation.it: Tesoro, resta con me e andrà tutto bene. Freddie, non posso.

translation.en: -Of course you can. I need you, Mary. -Freddie, I'm pregnant.
translation.it: Sì che puoi. Ho bisogno di te, Mary. Freddie, sono incinta.

translation.en: How could you?
How could I?
-Freddie, this has nothing to do with you. -[Paul] Come on. Let's get in.
translation.it: Freddie, non sono affari tuoi. Venite. Entriamo.

translation.en: -I bought some nibbles. -[door opens]
-Sorry we're late. -[men laughing]
What a pleasant surprise.
Hans. Everyone, come in.
Milan, make our guests comfortable.
translation.it: Milan, fai gli onori di casa.

translation.en: I wish I knew you were coming to stay.
I'd have scrubbed the place.
-Actually, I'm not staying. -Wait. Mary, wait. Don't go.
translation.it: Non mi fermo. Mary, aspetta. Non andartene.

translation.en: You told me you had a dream.
translation.it: Hai detto che hai fatto un sogno.

translation.en: What was it?
I was trying to talk to you...
...but it was like talking to my father.
translation.it: ma era come parlare con mio padre.

translation.en: You needed to tell me something...
but you couldn't say it.
Because you had no voice.
[Paul] Freddie, come and say hello to our new guests.
translation.it: Freddie, vieni a salutare i nuovi ospiti.

translation.en: -They're dying to meet you. -[sniffs]
-[door opens] -He'll be one second.
[Freddie] Mary!
I'm happy for you, Mary.
Truly, I am.
It's just...
-I'm frightened. -Freddie, you don't need to be.
translation.it: Ho paura. Freddie, non devi averne.

translation.en: Because no matter what, you are loved.
translation.it: Perché, malgrado tutto, c'è chi ti vuole bene.

translation.en: By me, by Brian, Deacy, Roger... your family.
translation.it: Io, Brian, Deacy, Roger, la tua famiglia.

translation.en: It's enough.
And these people... they don't care about you.
translation.it: A questa gente, invece, non importa di te.

translation.en: Paul doesn't care about you.
translation.it: A Paul non importa di te.

translation.en: You don't belong here, Freddie.
translation.it: Il tuo posto non è qui, Freddie.

translation.en: Come home.
Home.
What are you doing? You'll catch your death.
Why didn't you tell me about Live Aid?
translation.it: Perché non mi hai detto del Live Aid?

translation.en: The Africa charity gig?
It'll be an embarrassment. I didn't wanna waste your time.
translation.it: Sarà una cosa imbarazzante. Non volevo farti perdere tempo.

translation.en: -You should have told me. -Of course I did.
You forgot.
You're always forgetting things.
Come in now and have a drink.
-You're out. -[Paul] What do you mean?
I want you out of my life.
translation.it: Ti voglio fuori dalla mia vita.

translation.en: 'Cause I'm the only one left, you're blaming me for everything?
translation.it: Sono l'unico rimasto e dai la colpa di tutto a me?

translation.en: I blame myself.
translation.it: Do la colpa a me stesso.

translation.en: So I'm out? Just like that?
translation.it: Quindi mi fai fuori? Su due piedi?

translation.en: After everything we've been through?
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che abbiamo passato?

translation.en: Just think of the photos I have.
translation.it: Pensa alle foto in mio possesso.

translation.en: I know who you are, Freddie Mercury.
translation.it: So tutto di te, Freddie Mercury.

translation.en: [Freddie] You know when you know you've gone rotten?
translation.it: Sai quando capisci di essere marcio?

translation.en: Really rotten?
Fruit flies.
Dirty little fruit flies.
Coming to feast on what's left.
translation.it: Che banchettano su ciò che resta.

translation.en: Well, there isn't much left for you to feast on anymore.
translation.it: Be', qui non c'è più niente su cui banchettare.

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" plays] -So, fly off.
Do what you like with your photographs and your stories.
translation.it: Fai quello che ti pare con le tue foto e i tuoi aneddoti.

translation.en: But promise me one thing:
That I never see your face again.
Ever.
I didn't mean it.
-I'm sorry! Freddie, come back! -♪ Pushing down on me ♪
-♪ Pressin' down on you ♪ -I'll make it better.
[Paul] But, Peter, you might be right. I'm not even hurt
translation.it: Peter, forse hai ragione. Non mi ferisce il fatto che mia abbia scaricato come amico.

translation.en: by the fact that he's let me go as a friend.
translation.it: Non mi ferisce il fatto che mia abbia scaricato come amico.

translation.en: But you can only be there so much for a person.
translation.it: Ma una persona puoi aiutarla fino a un certo punto.

translation.en: [journalist] And so, Mr. Prenter...
all these stories about Freddie Mercury and his lovers...
translation.it: le voci sulla promiscuità di Freddie Mercury,

translation.en: -that there were so many. -[Paul] Yeah?
[journalist] Is it really true?
[Paul] Yes, it is. His lovers were countless.
translation.it: - Sono vere? - Sì. Ne ha avuti un'infinità.

translation.en: Genuinely countless. Uh...
All these wild, drug-fueled parties
translation.it: Tutte quelle feste a base di droga,

translation.en: where he'd find another lover every night and...
and a routine he couldn't get out of.
translation.it: Non sapeva uscire da quella routine.

translation.en: [journalist] So, you really did see behind the mask?
translation.it: Quindi lei vedeva dietro la maschera?

translation.en: I knew Freddie when he did "Bohemian Rhapsody."
translation.it: Ho conosciuto il Freddie Mercury di "Bohemian Rhapsody".

translation.en: And the Freddie we have now...
he doesn't have the same passion about music.
translation.it: ...non ha la stessa passione per la musica.

translation.en: Hello?
-Hello? -Miami?
-Freddie? How are you? -There was this Africa concert...
translation.it: Freddie? Come stai? So che c'è un concerto per l'Africa

translation.en: -that wants Queen to play. Is that still... -You mean Live Aid?
translation.it: e che vogliono i Queen. È ancora... Parli del Live Aid?

translation.en: They've announced all the bands, Freddie. It's too late.
translation.it: Hanno già annunciato le band. È troppo tardi.

translation.en: I need... I need to reconnect with the mothership.
translation.it: Ho bisogno... Ho bisogno di ricollegarmi con la nave madre.

translation.en: Freddie, they don't want anything to do with you.
translation.it: Non vogliono più avere a che fare con te.

translation.en: They're still very upset.
Maybe if-- if you ask them, they would meet me.
translation.it: Forse, se glielo chiedi tu, accetteranno di incontrarmi.

translation.en: Tell them I want to talk.
Just talk.
We're family.
You know, family... have fights...
...all the time.
-I can call. -Thank you...
...Jim.
[journalist] As this friend, somebody who...
translation.it: Da amico, visto che forse lei

translation.en: probably knows Freddie Mercury better than anybody else,
translation.it: conosce Freddie Mercury meglio di tutti,

translation.en: how would you describe him inside as a person?
For me, Freddie will always be this frightened little Paki boy...
translation.it: Per me Freddie sarà sempre un ragazzino pakistano spaventato

translation.en: who's afraid to be alone.
translation.it: che ha paura di restare solo.

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" resumes] -[journalist] I hope he sees this, and realizes
translation.it: Spero si renda conto di quanto lei fosse prezioso.

translation.en: what he has lost in you.
translation.it: Spero si renda conto di quanto lei fosse prezioso. Anch'io.

translation.en: -[Paul] I hope he does, too. -[journalist] A close and important friend.
Where are they?
They're late.
-[Beach] Hi, guys. -[Brian] Jim.
[Beach] If anybody wants any tea, coffee,
translation.it: Se volete un tè, un caffè,

translation.en: bladed weapons, just-- just ask.
So...
-who wants to go first? -I'll start.
I've been hideous. I know that, and... I deserve your fury.
translation.it: Sono stato odioso. Lo so. E... Merito la vostra rabbia.

translation.en: I've been conceited...
selfish...
-Well, an asshole, basically. -Strong beginning.
translation.it: In sostanza, uno stronzo. Sei partito bene.

translation.en: Look, I'm happy to strip off my shirt
translation.it: Sono disposto a strapparmi la camicia

translation.en: and flagellate myself before you.
translation.it: e flagellarmi di fronte a voi.

translation.en: Or rather, I could ask you a simple question.
I'm good with the flagellation.
What's it gonna take for you all to forgive me?
translation.it: Cosa devo fare per farmi perdonare?

translation.en: Is that what you want, Freddie?
-I forgive you. Is that it? Can we go now? -No.
translation.it: Ti perdono. - È tutto? Possiamo andare? - No.

translation.en: I went to Munich. I hired a bunch of guys.
translation.it: Sono stato a Monaco. Ho assunto delle persone.

translation.en: I told them exactly what I wanted them to do,
and the problem was...
...they did it.
No pushback from Roger.
None of your rewrites. None of his funny looks.
translation.it: Non c'erano le tue correzioni. Né le sue occhiatacce.

translation.en: I need you.
And you need me.
translation.it: E voi avete bisogno di me.

translation.en: [pats] Let's face it. We're not bad for four aging queens.
translation.it: Diciamocelo. Non siamo male come regine attempate.

translation.en: So, um, go ahead. Name your terms.
translation.it: Quindi, forza. Ditemi le vostre condizioni.

translation.en: Could you give us a moment please, Fred?
Why'd you do that?
-I just felt like it. -[chuckles]
They'll be all right. They just need a bit of time.
translation.it: Accetteranno. Hanno solo bisogno di tempo.

translation.en: What if I don't have time?
What do you mean, Fred?
You can come back in now, if you'd like.
We decided...
-What did we decide? -From now on...
translation.it: Che abbiamo deciso? D'ora in poi,

translation.en: every song, no matter who wrote it, music, lyrics...
translation.it: ogni canzone, chiunque abbia scritto musica o parole,

translation.en: it's by Queen.
Not one of us, just Queen.
translation.it: Non di uno di noi, solo dei Queen.

translation.en: All the money, all the credits, split four ways evenly.
translation.it: E i soldi, tutti i proventi saranno divisi in parti uguali.

translation.en: Done.
We have a problem with the people around you.
translation.it: Non ci piace il tuo entourage.

translation.en: Paul is out. I fired him.
-On what pretext? -Villainy.
-What else? -Bob Geldof.
I called to convince him to squeeze you guys into the lineup for the Live Aid concert,
translation.it: Ho provato a convincerlo a infilarvi nel programma del Live Aid,

translation.en: but he wants an answer now.
You have to make a decision.
Every ticket's already sold.
100,000 people at Wembley... 100,000 people at JFK Stadium in Philadelphia...
translation.it: 100.000 persone a Wembley, 100.000 al JFK Stadium di Filadelfia,

translation.en: a global TV audience around the world of 150 countries, 13 satellites.
translation.it: collegamento TV per 150 Paesi in tutto il mondo, 13 satelliti.

translation.en: The Olympics only had three.
translation.it: Le Olimpiadi ne avevano solo tre.

translation.en: We haven't played together in years.
It's kinda suicide to play again for the first time in front of millions.
translation.it: È un suicidio ripartire davanti a milioni di persone.

translation.en: Try over 1.5 billion.
[scoffs] "Who are these four dinosaurs?"
"Where's Madonna?"
It's a 20-minute set. Everyone gets the same.
translation.it: Il tempo a disposizione sarà di 20 minuti. È uguale per tutti.

translation.en: Jagger, Bowie...
Elton...
McCartney, The Who...
Led Zeppelin...
Phil Collins, REO Speedwagon...
Certainly good company.
[Beach] Anybody who is anybody is doing this concert.
Look. All I know...
is that if we wake up the day after this concert...
translation.it: che se il giorno dopo il concerto ci sveglieremo...

translation.en: and we didn't do our part...
translation.it: senza aver fatto la nostra parte,

translation.en: we're going to regret it till the day we die.
translation.it: ce ne pentiremo fino alla morte.

translation.en: Please.
[news anchor] Every day, in San Francisco, two more men hear the grim news...
translation.it: A San Francisco, due uomini al giorno si sentono dire:

translation.en: "You have AIDS, there's no cure."
Since doctors in France and America isolated the virus in 1983,
translation.it: Dal 1983, quando il virus è stato isolato in Francia e America,

translation.en: research has proceeded at a frantic pace.
translation.it: le ricerche continuano a ritmo frenetico.

translation.en: The method used by the virus to destroy
translation.it: Il metodo usato dal virus per distruggere il sistema immunitario

translation.en: the body's immune system has been discovered...
translation.it: Il metodo usato dal virus per distruggere il sistema immunitario è stato individuato,

translation.en: -♪ There's no time for us ♪ -...but a cure still seems many years away.
translation.it: ma la cura sembra ancora lontana molti anni.

translation.en: -A major breakthrough has been a new blood test... -♪ There's no place for us ♪
translation.it: Grazie a un nuovo esame del sangue, in futuro si potrà evitare di contrarre l'AIDS con le trasfusioni.

translation.en: ♪ What is this thing That builds our dreams ♪
[doctor] Do you understand?
The way we go from here is that treatments are available.
translation.it: Possiamo solo affidarci alle cure disponibili.

translation.en: They're not particularly effective, Freddie.
Yep.
-Let's call it. Yeah? -Yeah, yeah.
Sorry.
I sound like shit.
You all are lovely, you sound good.
Been a while.
My throat feels like a vulture's crotch.
translation.it: La mia gola sembra lo scroto di un avvoltoio.

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[Roger] We still got a week.
-[John] We'll get there. -[Brian] Yeah, we're in a good place, Fred.
translation.it: Ce la faremo. Stiamo andando bene, Fred.

translation.en: You just need a bit of rest, that's all.
Yeah.
-[John] Get a drink, Rog? -[Roger] Yeah, there's a nice little pub
translation.it: Beviamo qualcosa, Rog? Sì, c'è un pub più avanti.

translation.en: -down the road, actually. -[Brian] Can I come?
translation.it: Sì, c'è un pub più avanti. Posso venire?

translation.en: [John] We're just an exclusive...
[Roger] No, of course not. Invite-only.
translation.it: - È un'esclusiva... - Certo che no. - Solo su invito. - Gentile.

translation.en: [Brian] Yeah, that's kind of you.
[Freddie] Before you leave...
-Could I have a second? -[Roger] Yeah. What's up?
translation.it: mi concedete un attimo? Sì. Cosa c'è?

translation.en: I've got it.
Got what?
AIDS.
I wanted you to hear it from me.
translation.it: Volevo che lo sapeste da me.

translation.en: -[Brian] Fred, I'm so sorry. -[Freddie] Brian, stop.
Don't.
For right now, it's between us. All right? Just us.
translation.it: Per adesso, che resti tra noi. Va bene? Solo tra noi.

translation.en: So, please, if any of you...
translation.it: Quindi, per favore, se qualcuno di voi

translation.en: fuss about it or frown about it, or, worst of all...
translation.it: si agita, si rattrista o, peggio ancora,

translation.en: if you bore me with your sympathy, that's just seconds wasted.
translation.it: mi annoia con la compassione, spreca solo secondi preziosi.

translation.en: Seconds that could be used making music,
translation.it: Secondi che potremmo usare per fare musica,

translation.en: which is all I want to do with the time I have left.
translation.it: l'unica cosa che voglio fare nel tempo che mi resta.

translation.en: I don't have time to be their victim...
translation.it: Non ho tempo per essere la loro vittima,

translation.en: their AIDS poster boy, their cautionary tale.
translation.it: la faccia da mettere sui manifesti come spauracchio.

translation.en: No, I decide who I am.
I'm going to be what I was born to be.
translation.it: E voglio essere quello per cui sono nato.

translation.en: A performer...
who gives the people what they want.
translation.it: in grado di dare ciò che la gente vuole.

translation.en: Touch of the heavens.
Freddie fucking Mercury.
You're a legend, Fred.
You're bloody right I am. We're all legends.
translation.it: Puoi dirlo forte. Lo siamo tutti.

translation.en: But you're right, I am a legend.
translation.it: Ma hai ragione. Sono una leggenda.

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -Now, you give me a chance to get my bitchy little vocal cords in order...
translation.it: Datemi modo di mettere a posto queste odiose corde vocali

translation.en: and we'll go and punch a hole through the roof of that stadium.
translation.it: e faremo venire giù il tetto di quello stadio.

translation.en: -Actually, Wembley doesn't have a roof. -[all chuckle]
translation.it: A Wembley non c'è il tetto.

translation.en: -All right. -No, he's right. It doesn't.
translation.it: - Va bene. - Ha ragione. Non c'è.

translation.en: Then we'll punch a hole in the sky.
translation.it: Allora faremo venire giù il cielo.

translation.en: Now, even though you're crying like three little girls, I still love you.
translation.it: Anche se piangete come tre mocciose,

translation.en: -All right, enough of this. -[Roger] All right.
translation.it: vi voglio bene lo stesso. - Dai, basta. - Va bene.

translation.en: -[Brian] Drink? -[Roger] Yes!
-[John] Or ten? -Yeah.
What are you looking at?
You think you could do better?
Everyone's a critic.
[Richard] It's 12:00 noon in London.
-7:00 a.m. in Philadelphia. -[crowd cheering]
And around the world, it's time for Live Aid.
translation.it: E in tutto il mondo è l'ora del Live Aid.

translation.en: [Bob Geldof] If you have credit cards, you can phone up with the number you want to give.
translation.it: Se avete la carta di credito, telefonate e donate qualcosa.

translation.en: But you can also pledge cash, and it's very important.
translation.it: telefonate e donate qualcosa. Anche contanti, è importante.

translation.en: There is not enough money coming in...
and all these people are not playing for the good of their health.
translation.it: Questi artisti non suonano per loro stessi,

translation.en: They're playing for the good of other people's health.
translation.it: Questi artisti non suonano per loro stessi, ma per la salute di altre persone.

translation.en: -So get your money out now! -[slams table]
And phone up and give us the money.
You've got plenty of it, or if you got none of it,
translation.it: Ne avete tanti. E, se non ne avete,

translation.en: get it to people who are dying of starvation.
translation.it: donateli a chi sta morendo di fame.

translation.en: We want to get a million pounds out of this country.
translation.it: donateli a chi sta morendo di fame. L'obiettivo è un milione di sterline.

translation.en: On the telephone, before 10:00 tonight.
translation.it: L'obiettivo è un milione di sterline. Per telefono, prima delle 22:00 di stasera.
